output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the total supply to any value, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can mint arbitrary tokens, aka 'mintTokenIntegerOverflow' issue.

Integer overflow in sellOffline function allows the owner to set remaining supply to any value, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can set remaining supply arbitrarily, aka 'sellOfflineIntegerOverflow' issue.
transfer function allows arbitrary transfers, allowing attackers to steal any tokens, aka 'transferAccessControl' issue.
transferFrom function allows arbitrary transfers, allowing attackers to steal any tokens, aka 'transferFromAccessControl' issue.
mintToken function allows minting of tokens to any address, allowing attackers to increase total supply arbitrarily, aka 'mintTokenAccessControl' issue.
